summary: A man, released after a jail term for a crime he did not commit, raises a gang to go after the man who framed him.
cast: Brett Halsey|Bud Spencer|Wayde Preston|Jeff Cameron|Franco Borelli|Dana Ghia|Teodoro Corrà|Victoriano Gazzarra|Aldo Marianecci|Michele Borelli|Umberto Di Grazia|Franco Pechini|Nazzareno Natale|William Berger|Tatsuya Nakadai|Remo Capitani|Lina Franchi|Giglio Gigli|Franco Gulà|Riccardo Petrazzi|Renzo Pevarello|Aysanoa Runachagua|Pietro Torrisi|Rinaldo Zamperla
keywords: murder of wife|rape and murder|forced to watch rape|wife raped in front of husband|spaghetti western
title: Ojo por ojo
